page.title: 16Youth Clubs in Ferryhill
page.content: The area is served by youth clubs in both Ferryhill and Ferryhill Station. Both are subsidised by County Council and local council. The Ferryhill youth club is open 5 nights a week and Ferryhill Station 2 nights a week(except during school holidays).Ferryhill has its own premises in an old Miners Institute Building but Ferryhill Station shares premises with other organisations. Both clubs offer a wide variety of activities to cater to ages ranging from 7 to 21.These activities range from sport through art and craft to music and discussion.Teams from both youth clubs take part in competitions and other activities outside the immediate area.
